revised_title: Ultrastructural Analysis of Delthyrial Covers in Living Brachiopods
tldr: The author examines the ultrastructure and growth of delthyrial covers in living brachiopods, specifically focusing on the junction between the pedicle and outer epithelia. They discover that the junction is sharply differentiated into two types of epithelial cells and that the delthyrial covers grow through the expansion of deltidial plates and the secretion of a bonding sheet between the cuticle and shell. This research provides valuable insights into the anatomical changes that occurred during brachiopod evolution.
